name: Karate Kolour
description:
This game was created during the "Summer Lab 2022" at the educational institute Image Campus.

"Labs" are workshops where students from the different careers and courses offered by the institute, guided and assisted by professors, work together towards a shared goal: developing simple but complete video games within a short period of time.

Credits
  • Diego Moros - Programmer
  • Bruno Bevilacqua - Artist
  • Tomas Chavez - Artist
  • Joaquin Otero - SFX/Music
  • Paula Miranda - SFX/Music
  • Julian Silguero - SFX/Music
  • Francisco Imperioso - Game Designer/Programmer
Special thanks to:

  • Lautaro Maciel
  • and all Image Campus Staff!
